meanings.definition: Most attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The prince was the handsomest man in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: She thought the puppy was the handsomest of all.
meanings.sent3: The handsomest flower in the garden bloomed in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: The handsomest sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The handsomest peacock strutted proudly, displaying its colorful feathers.

meanings.definition: Most generous or considerable in amount.
meanings.sent1: He received the handsomest reward for his hard work.
meanings.sent2: The handsomest donation came from an anonymous benefactor.
meanings.sent3: The handsomest portion of cake was saved for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The handsomest gift was wrapped in shiny gold paper.
meanings.sent5: The handsomest sum of money was donated to the charity.
